intro: Stelin, commonly known as the African violet, is a popular ornamental plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its velvety leaves and showy flowers. The plant typically grows in shaded, humid environments and prefers well-draining soil. Its flowers come in a variety of colors, including purple, pink, white, and blue. Stelin is often cultivated as a houseplant due to its ability to thrive indoors with proper care.
